name: Bean Soccer
description:
A Multiplayer Soccer Game created for https://itch.io/jam/lost-relic-games-1 game jam.

The theme for the game jam was connection. In this game you connect with the ball to connect the ball to the goal! Also connect with some friends because it's multiplayer only. Supports up to 8 players (2 keyboard and up to 8 controllers) and can be played remotely with Parsec.

If you'd like to see further development of this game, let me know!
